Title: NutriJelEX
Description:
Heavy corpses weighing you down?
The NutriJelEx will refine unsightly corpses and other nutrient sources.  At the push of the button you will have delcious high protein, gluten and spore free gel food product! (Batteries Required, see owner's manual for details).

Adds the NutriJelEx into the game. This back slot item uses battery power to refine food items into more lightweight form.

The NutriJelEx is tinkerable.

Your feedback is greatly appreciated!

Thank you for trying my mod <3
	- BluePsion
